115 class PostProcessingEffect: public Object, public Nameable, public Identifiable, protected GL::OpenGLFunctions {
116 public:
117  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
120 
121  enum EffectFlag {
122  kSetCheckPoint = 1 << 0, // Blit to checkpoint buffer after this effect is applied
123  kUseCheckPoint = 1 << 1, // Whether or not to bind the checkpoint texture for effect
124  kUseCameraTexture = 1 << 2, // Whether or not to use the unprocessed scene texture
125  };
126 
128 
129  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132  PostProcessingEffect();
133  PostProcessingEffect(const QString& name);
134  virtual ~PostProcessingEffect();
135 
137 
138  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
141 
142  bool hasCheckPoint() const { return m_effectFlags.testFlag(kSetCheckPoint); }
143  void setCheckPoint(bool sc) { m_effectFlags.setFlag(kSetCheckPoint, sc); }
144 
145  bool usesCheckPoint() const { return m_effectFlags.testFlag(kUseCheckPoint); }
146  void useCheckPoint(bool use) {
147  m_effectFlags.setFlag(kUseCheckPoint, use);
148  }
149 
150  bool usesCameraTexture() const { return m_effectFlags.testFlag(kUseCameraTexture); }
151  void useCameraTexture(bool use) {
152  m_effectFlags.setFlag(kUseCameraTexture, use);
153  }
154 
155  const std::shared_ptr<ShaderPreset>& shaderPreset() const { return m_shaderPreset; }
156 
158 
159  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
162 
164  void addStage(const std::shared_ptr<PostProcessingEffectStage>& stage);
165 
167  void reinitialize(CoreEngine* core);
168 
170  virtual void applyEffect(PostProcessingChain& chain);
171 
173 
174 protected:
175  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
178 
180 
181  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
184 
186  QFlags<EffectFlag> m_effectFlags;
187 
189  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<PostProcessingEffectStage>> m_stages;
190 
192  std::shared_ptr<ShaderPreset> m_shaderPreset;
193
